name: Delicious Harvest's Boon
desc: A luxurious, flavor-packed meal held together by the humble Grainfruit. Your anticipation soars even as the oven's heat does, and once you taste it, the sweetness of Grainfruit and the savoriness of the minced meat break out into a joyful dance on your taste buds... Huh, your hands and legs are instinctively swaying along to the beat.

customize.name: Recipe: Harvest's Boon
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Harvest's Boon.

customize.name: Harvest's Boon
customize.desc: A rich and comforting meal held together by the humble Grainfruit. Minced meat is stir-fried and placed in a baking pan with larger chunks of meat and eggs. The whole thing is then covered with a layer of mashed Grainfruit and baked until a tantalizing golden brown. This hearty dish can often be found on the tables of the Collective of Plenty during harvest festivals.

customize.name: Suspicious Harvest's Boon
customize.desc: A strange-looking meal barely held together by the humble Grainfruit. The blackened outer shell reminds you of the importance of heat control. Considering the time and effort you spent gathering the ingredients... Maybe the inside's not as burnt. Perhaps it's still worth a try?

customize.name: Delicious Harvest's Boon
customize.desc: A luxurious, flavor-packed meal held together by the humble Grainfruit. Your anticipation soars even as the oven's heat does, and once you taste it, the sweetness of Grainfruit and the savoriness of the minced meat break out into a joyful dance on your taste buds... Huh, your hands and legs are instinctively swaying along to the beat.

customize.name: Grainfruit
customize.desc: This plant is named after the giant grains that grow along the cob.

customize.name: Raw Meat
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

customize.name: Bird Egg
customize.desc: An incredibly versatile ingredient that can supply all of your daily protein needs.

customize.name: Milk
customize.desc: Sweet and fragrant cow's milk. Don't waste a single drop, not even that one rolling down your chin.

value.text:
A little surprise from the Collective of Plenty.
Regenerates 1 HP to the selected character every 8s for 48s and displays the logo of the Collective of Plenty. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
